tool.name: Cluster Report
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**TIP:** If your data is not TAB delimited, use *Text Manipulation->Convert*
-----
This tool generates a report of the Kmedoid algorithm
**Example**
- Sample report output::
centroid.matrix 5.2 5.0 2.43 3.0 1.0 3.21 4.0 8.0
centroid.idx 3 1
groups 1 1 2 1 3 3
